title: Edinson Cavani
summary: Edinson Roberto Cavani Gómez (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈeðinsoŋ kaˈβani]; born 14 February 1987) is a Uruguayan professional footballer who plays as a striker for Premier League club Manchester United and the Uruguay national team. He is widely considered one of the best strikers of his generation, known for his clinical finishing.[3][4][5]
